dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: Why Apple Stock Gained 30% Last Year
News Content: Investors are plowing into this popular name in anticipation of its next long-lived growth run.

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.75, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.25
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.3, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: -1, Prediction of stock price falling: -1
Round: 1
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.65, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.35
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.65, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.35
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.65, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.35
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.8, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.2
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.8, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.2
Round: 2
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.75, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.25
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.65, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.35
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.8, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.2
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.85, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.15


Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

```
{
  "reasoning": "The news headline 'Why Apple Stock Gained 30% Last Year' suggests a positive trend for Apple's stock price. The content of the news indicates that investors are anticipating the company's next growth run, which implies a bullish sentiment. Analyzing the previous predictions from various models, there is a general trend of increasing confidence in the stock price rising, with some models showing a significant increase in their prediction of a stock price rise from Round 0 to Round 2. For example, the meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct model increased its prediction from 0.7 to 0.8, and the qwen/qwen-turbo model increased its prediction from -1 (not available) to 0.85. This trend, combined with the positive news, supports a higher probability of the stock price rising. However, it's essential to consider that the stock market can be volatile, and past performance does not guarantee future results. Therefore, while the probability of the stock price rising is estimated to be higher, there is still a chance it could fall due to unforeseen market conditions or other factors not mentioned in the news.",
  "company_name": "Apple Inc.",
  "company_symbol": "AAPL",
  "news_headline": "Why Apple Stock Gained 30% Last Year",
  "probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.82,
  "probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.18
}
```
